name: AT&T Community & Employee Discounts
description: 25% off for heroes/educators or $10/line/month for employees/students
fullDescription: AT&T offers multiple discount programs including 25% off for military, veterans, retired first responders, teachers, nurses, and physicians. Additional discounts available for students, seniors 55+, AARP members, and employees of qualifying companies through Signature Hub.
whatTheyOffer:
**AT&T Appreciation (25% off):**
- Military, veterans, retired first responders
- Teachers (K-12 and college faculty)
- Nurses, physicians, PA-Cs
- Applies to Unlimited Premium, Extra, and Starter plans

**AT&T Signature Program ($10/line/month off):**
- Employees of qualifying companies
- Students with .edu email
- AARP members
- Union members
- Up to 5 lines, then $5/line for lines 6-10

**55+ Plans:**
- Special pricing for customers 55 and older
howToGetIt:
1. Appreciation discounts: Visit att.com/appreciation and verify through ID.me
2. Signature/employee discounts: Visit att.com/verification/signaturehub
3. Students: Verify with .edu email or student ID
4. AARP members: Verify membership status
5. 55+: Visit att.com or AT&T store to sign up for age-verified plans
6. Discount starts within 2-3 billing cycles
keywords: AT&T, military discount, veteran, first responder, teacher, nurse, physician, student, senior, 55+, AARP, Signature Hub, employee discount, 25% off, cell phone, wireless plan, ID.me
